TEXT_HEAD_INTRO: Create online survey, questionnaire, data collection... Quick & Easy.
TEXT_LOGIN_PROMPT: Don't have account yet? Register first:

CHO_FEATURE1_TEXT: Generate the online survey and questionary quick and easy.
CHO_FEATURE2_TEXT: Grasp market trends, market dynamics and Big data collection.
CHO_FEATURE3_TEXT: Based on user geographic location and distribution of the audience crowd.
CHO_STEP1_TEXT: It's very easy to generate online survey and questionnaire  by 'CHORICE'. Let's start with your first Question.
CHO_STEP2_TEXT: Next is adding the options. 'CHORICE' provides what your see is what you get experience.
CHO_STEP3_TEXT: 'CHORICE' provides simple management portal. You will find it's so easy to access and manage all your surveys.
CHO_STEP4_TEXT: By click the 'Share' button, simply share your survey on Facebook, Twitter or Email.
CHO_STEP5_TEXT: 'CHORICE' generate elegant and responsive survey which is suit for any mobile phone or tablets.
CHO_STEP6_TEXT: Check the survey report by times of answer and shared statistics; analyse the market based on the user location.
